document.masterDocTitle: Synopsis of the shore bugs of China (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Leptopodomorpha: Saldidae)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Synopsis of the shore bugs of China (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Leptopodomorpha: Saldidae)

subSubSection.paragraph: Distribution in China : Heilongjiang ( Chen & Lindskog 1994 ).

Distribution in China :
Inner Mongolia
(
Nonnaizab et al . 1999
,
Li et al. 2008
), Sichuang ( Chen & Lindskog 1994 ), Xinjiang (Vinokurov et al. 2012, Vinokurov 2015). New for Heilongjiang and Qinghai provinces.
